author: Emily Fuchs (she/they)
title: L2C and V2A: Lab 5 Make-Up Labs
question:
If you are registered in L2C or V2A, your lab is cancelled on the day of Midterm 1 (Monday, February 7). All other lab sections on the day of Midterm 1 are scheduled as usual. 
Please attend any lab section that fits your course schedule from Tuesday, February 8 to Friday, February 11 to complete Lab 5. You do not need to notify anyone ahead of time, but please tell the TA in the lab section that you join for your make-up lab that you usually attend L2C or V2A. 
If you do not complete a make-up lab on one of these days, you will receive 0 for Lab 5.
